channel.title: Trying to make a command work
channel.description: Ok guys, Heres my question. I was trying to add a command to make people members. It works fine exept i wanted to say when the log in "Member "+playerName+" has logged in" and when they yell it should say "[Member] "+playerName+": blah blah blah" But it just is like a normal player's login text and yell, not what I want. Help!? PLease! (playerrights for mem is 7 right?) Thank you. -Ghostly

item.title: Trying to make a command work
item.dc:creator: @Unruling Unruling
item.description:
@Unruling wrote:

Ok sorry for bringing this thread back up ( im not spamming just generally waiting for a reply on my help thread )

Ok mate ,

I’d prefer you to add my msn and ill do it for you + explain how to do it
xtrivia-virus@hotmail.co.uk

Read full topic

item.title: Trying to make a command work
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:16, topic:317018”][quote author=ghostly150 link=topic=413580.msg3045808#msg3045808 date=1259456500]
theres nothing anywhere in my client thats similar. Wht method does it go near?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 28, 2009, 07:04:36 pm[/size][hr]i think my server only goes up to player rights 6… im using deltascape v11 source
[/quote]

The playerRights variable is an integer and an integer can hold up to a value of 2147483647, so it can have that many rights.[/quote]

That’s alot of rights

Read full topic

The playerRights variable is an integer and an integer can hold up to a value of 2147483647, so it can have that many rights.

item.title: Trying to make a command work
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:10, topic:317018”]It’s a field, thus anywhere in the client class, however you should make sure it isn’t under any methods.[/quote]Yes, otherwise they will be method specific and can’t be called outside of it.

And its in server’s client.java

Read full topic

item.description:

ghostly150:

in server or client?

[quote=“The Soul, post:10, topic:317018”][quote author=ghostly150 link=topic=413580.msg3045787#msg3045787 date=1259456067]
where do i add it next to?
[/quote]

It’s a field, thus anywhere in the client class, however you should make sure it isn’t under any methods.[/quote]

item.title: Trying to make a command work
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

ghostly150:

where do i add it next to?

It’s a field, thus anywhere in the client class, however you should make sure it isn’t under any methods.
